amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute comprises the budget proposal of the Congressional Progressive Caucus and appears on page H3114 of the Congressional Record of April 9, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-405 to restore economic health by creating 8.8 million jobs by 2017 through investments in education, infrastructure and research and to reduce deficits by $4 trillion by 2024.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 327 (Roll no. 173).

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Grijalva.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 327 (Roll no. 173).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Grijalva.
